Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: The CAR SOS crew travel to darkest Bournemouth to discover a severe case of Anglia obsession. The Hutchins-Clarke family only have eyes for one car, each of them owning at least one Ford Anglia. All except poor James. Having been stripped of spares by his parts hungry relations Tim & Fuzz swoop in and rescue James sorry Anglia, but can they save it? The next 3 weeks are a blur of Anglia action; high powered engines, lowered suspension, thumping hi-fis and supercool wheels. The car that results is Fuzzs perfect Anglia and hes fallen in love. Its a painful parting for the master mechanic but will this supercool 60s ride get the welcome it deserves from its surprised new owner?

programme.title: Undercover History Updates
programme.desc: Compelling documentary series that examines some of the world's most famous mysteries, using latest discoveries. Some of them will finally be solved, and some will raise more questions then ever before. Did the police catch infamous Boston Strangler, or is he still walking the streets today? Will modern forensics and DNA analysis help solve the mystery of a famous hijacker Dan Cooper? Will we find out what happened with the Romanovs as forensic scientists attempt to identify remains that were discovered near the possible murder site? Find out in this extraordinary series.

programme.title: World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Grab your sunglasses… This week on World's Toughest Fixes we're going to harness the sun to drive the only operating solar reflective power tower in the United States. This show is definitely not for the superstitious as Riley joins a crew lifting two 65 ton boilers 160 feet up to two towers and suspending them above 24,000 mirrors… One slip up and it's going to be way more than seven years bad luck.

programme.title: Atlantis Rising
programme.desc: Executive Produced by James Cameron, "Atlantis Discovered" is a 1x120 detective thriller that seeks out, uncovers and explores artifacts such as archaeological finds, satellite photographs, manuscripts hiding in plain sight, underwater exploration, etc. and attempt to "decode" the artifacts as springboards to further the investigation to get to the bottom of the story.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The Battle of Jutland was the most violent sea battle in history, fought in 1916 between the mighty battle fleets of Britain and Germany. After a day of carnage, both sides claimed victory. So who really won? Maritime archaeologists and historians go in search of Jutland's secrets, hidden deep underwater. Scientific data combines with computer graphics to drain the North Sea, investigating the mega battleships of World War One and asks what happened to them once the firing was over.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is a whacky British science show that looks at some of the most watched videos on the internet and explains the science behind them. Initially hosted by Top Gear's Richard Hammond, and later by Dallas Campbell, this National Geographic is a comedic gem. With the first series airing episodes titled Cannon Ball Ice Dude, Learning to Fly, Jet Pack Failure and Dancing Disaster, you can guarantee that this is one of the most ridiculous shows on television. What more could you want?

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is a whacky British science show that looks at some of the most watched videos on the internet and explains the science behind them. Initially hosted by Top Gear's Richard Hammond, and later by Dallas Campbell, this National Geographic is a comedic gem. With the first series airing episodes titled Cannon Ball Ice Dude, Learning to Fly, Jet Pack Failure and Dancing Disaster, you can guarantee that this is one of the most ridiculous shows on television. What more could you want?

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded is back for a third season. Richard Hammond introduces a host of new mishaps featuring brave, if misguided individuals from around the world and then explains the science behind their failure and humiliation with the use of bespoke animations and super slo-mo cinematography. In this episode we learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when biking downstairs, racing at street luge and attempting the uneven bars.

programme.title: Made in a Day
programme.desc: Helicopters are the machines at the frontlines of every, major emergency and there are 30,000 civilian ones in the world today. In this episode we see how Airbus make the H-125 – the most popular single engine chopper on the planet.

programme.title: Made in a Day
programme.desc: Gate Gourmet are the world's largest airline caterers, producing millions of meals from their huge Los Angeles kitchen every year. In this episode we go behind-the-scenes to reveal how locally sourced ingredients, and expert chefs, manage to feed 40,000 people flying from LAX every day.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz make their way to East London to take on a 1964 Porsche 356, without a shred of a doubt, the worst car they have ever taken on. In spite of its almost terminal condition underneath allthat rust and rot lies an automotive legend as the 356 was the car that really launched Porsche overnight into the high end sports car market. The car belongs to 67 year old former ambulance driver Trevor who has owned the car since the 1980s. It was the car of his dreams and even though he struggled to afford the ever growing repair bills, when the car ended up stored in a damp garage Trevor could never quite bring himself to let go of the idea he might once more be able to drive it. Recently Trevor was diagnosed with advanced prostate cancer meaning his restoration dream would never come true so his daughters wrote to Tim and Fuzz hoping that they could help their Dad get back behind the wheel of his beloved car one last time.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz are off to County Durham to pick up one of the greatest British post war sports cars ever made – a 1961 Austin Healey 3000. The car is owned by former engineer John and it's been in his family since it was new. John had planned to completely restore the car as a retirement project however when he was struck down with Parkinson's disease his classic car dream faded away. 76 year old John decided to invest his life savings having the car restored, however the project was never finished and when the boys get the car back to the Car SOS workshop they discover that John's pride and joy had become a catalogue of botched work and hidden shortcuts. Produced between 1959 and 1967 the Healey 3000, was a joint venture between car manufacturer Austin and performance car specialists the Donald Healey Motor Company. Equipped with a 3-litre straight six-cylinder engine, with twin SU carburettors it produced 124bhp meaning the car could reach a top speed of 114mph! Incredibly fast for a car of the time.

programme.title: Superstructures: Engineering Marvels
programme.desc: The series that reveals the extraordinary achievements and levels of engineering that went into some of the most incredible structures in the world. From the world's tallest building – the Burj Khalifa, ultimate cargo ships to the Volkswagen factory in Wolfsburg, Germany – the world's largest car plant and more. Each of these superstructures is broken down and analysed using CGI technology to provide an insight into the minds, workings and transformations of these incredible engineering marvels and how they went from the design board to reality.

programme.title: Superstructures: Engineering Marvels
programme.desc: The series that reveals the extraordinary achievements and levels of engineering that went into some of the most incredible structures in the world. From the world's tallest building – the Burj Khalifa, ultimate cargo ships to the Volkswagen factory in Wolfsburg, Germany – the world's largest car plant and more. Each of these superstructures is broken down and analysed using CGI technology to provide an insight into the minds, workings and transformations of these incredible engineering marvels and how they went from the design board to reality.

programme.title: Bid & Destroy
programme.desc: Brian, Lee, and the rest of the Danley Demolition team win a bid on a house that sits on a lake. While Brian won the property with a bid that was lower than Lee wanted, he is sure that the house will have some hidden gems in it proving the job worth the price. Though they find a few big items like a boat, a Pac-Man arcade game, and a vintage mini-bike, Lee is still concerned that they will lose money on the job. Demolishing a home on the water is a big challenge, since they must keep potentially toxic materials from contaminating the lake. When all is said and done, things go off without a hitch and they bring their findings home with them. With the help of an expert, Brian and Lee determine that they found enough awesome items to walk away with some extra cash in their pocket.

programme.title: Bid & Destroy
programme.desc: Brian and Lee arrive at a split-level home that sustained a house fire. The site supervisor explains that the woman has taken what she wants of the home and now, whatever is left is theirs. They notice a piano tucked away inside, and Lee has his eyes on some stuffed birds. Because of the low bid, Danley is left with a big challenge -- to make any money, they need to complete the job in one day. To make matters worse, the owner of the house wants to keep the foundation intact so that she can build on top of it. The low bid and foundation are big feats for Danley Demo to overcome, but with hard work and their back against the wall, there is very little that they can't accomplish.

programme.title: Alien Deep with Bob Ballard
programme.desc: Dr Robert Ballard is one of the world's most renowned ocean explorers , with such amazing finds as Titanic, the Battleship Bismarck and JFK's PT109 to his name. But this time he is going on a journey like no other. He's going to make an underwater odyssey down the world's tallest mountain! No, it's not Everest at 29,000 ft. It's Mauna Kea in Hawai'i. Standing 13,800 ft above sea level, this Pacific Giant also reaches down another 19,700 ft into the Alien Deep. Fighting unimaginable pressures, Ballard leads a two-submersible team right into the volcanic heart of the island and comes face to face with extraordinary creatures never before captured in 3D.

programme.title: Alien Deep with Bob Ballard
programme.desc: Dr. Robert Ballard is the Indiana Jones of the Alien Deep. He's on the hunt for the world's oldest shipwrecks in the Mediterranean Sea. Using tactics and technology developed over a 50 year career at sea, he is on a quest to uncover the lost history of the Ancient world. Who were these earliest of mariners and how did they live and die? How did the ocean and maritime culture help build those civilizations? The journey will take him deep in the chilly depths of the Mediterranean, to Hawai'i, and home to the U.S. He will find not just ancient wrecks but modern ones too, proving his assertion that the Alien Deep holds more treasure and history than all the world's museums combined.

programme.title: Bloody Tales of Europe
programme.desc: Tudor Historian Dr. Suzannah Lipscomb and journalist Joe Crowley team up to investigate three of history's most mysterious MURDERS. How did legendary warrior-king Attila the Hun end up dead the morning after his wedding? Did Richard III really kill his own young nephews in the Tower of London? And who was behind the mafia-style hit that took out Juan Borgia – son of Rome's Godfather, Pope Alexander VI.

programme.title: Bloody Tales of Europe
programme.desc: From one of Rome's most feared Emperors to Hungary's Countess Dracula, BLOODY TALES reveals some of history's most infamous characters and events. In MONSTERS, Tudor historian Dr Suzannah Lipscomb and journalist Joe Crowley team up to investigate three extraordinary stories. Why did young Emperor Caligula with the Roman Empire at his feet rule through fear and madness? How did a decorated French war hero turn into a prolific child killer? And why did an aging Hungarian widow become known as Countess Dracula?

programme.title: UFO Europe: The Untold Stories
programme.desc: Scotland's Livingston UFO, Norway's Hessdalen Lights and Portugal's Castelo de Bode Dam encounter. On 17th June, 1977 a young Portuguese pilot comes face to face with a large unknown object at 5,000 feet. He observes it for a few seconds before it vanishes into the clouds. Suddenly, his magnetic compass spins wildly and his aircraft goes into an uncontrolled nose dive. In the early 1980's hundreds of mysterious lights are witnessed flying through the Hessdalen Valley in Norway. Scientist Erling Strand from Ostfold University College is keen to investigate so he sets up camp in the valley. He is amazed at the spectacular lights and after capturing them on film, discovers something intriguing. In 1979 a Scottish forester describes an incredible encounter with a UFO in a lonely clearing. He falls down unconscious and when he comes to, finds cuts on his legs and tears on his trousers. The police launch the UK's first ever criminal investigation into a UFO encounter.

programme.title: UFO Europe: The Untold Stories
programme.desc: Rendlesham Revisited, Mussolini's Secret UFO Files and The Swedish Mora UFO Photos. Around 3am on Dec 26th 1980, US Air Force personnel venture into the forest to investigate strange lights. Two nights later, similar lights are seen again as the Deputy Base Commander makes his way through the forest with a team. A set of unknown files describing a UFO sighting in Venice in 1936 are anonymously sent to an Italian Ufologist. The documents within purport to be a secret government report of the UFO sighting and an extraordinary government cover up that followed. The documents state the cover up was ordered by the Italian dictator, Mussolini, who was convinced the sighting was of some sort of advanced European technology. On 15th September 1952, 20 year-old Nils Frost is cycling home late one night. As he arrives at his house he sees two bright glowing lights suspended above the forest nearby.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: A fascinating documentary series from National Geographic exploring Europe from above. Although only the second-smallest continent on our planet, Europe is packed full of diverse wildlife, cities, countries, politics and history. From this unique perspective, viewers can see the culturally rich continent like they never have before, with cameras in the sky offering a stunning examination of these beautiful lands. Each episode in this six-part series focusses on a respective country, with those explored in this series being the Netherlands, Italy, Germany, Spain, the United Kingdom and Poland. Narrated by Julian Barratt.

programme.title: Tracing Heritage
programme.desc: From the Huangshan mountain range to the largest city of China, Shanghai, Harry Yuan journeys along the lower reaches of China's Yangtze to see how the river has shaped life along its course for centuries. Join Harry as he learns how the waterway birth communities, goods, ideas and identities, and how it was once a highway of diverse goods and influences that gave rise to rich traditions still practiced today.

programme.title: King Tut in Color
programme.desc: A century after the world's most sensational archaeological find, of the tomb of Tutankhamun, now witness the dramatic scenes of its discovery and marvel at its extraordinary treasures, exactly as they were seen then, in colour. It's all thanks to the latest colourisation techniques which use detailed historical research to bring the Egypt of discoverer Howard Carter back to life.

programme.title: Black Pharaohs: Empire of Gold
programme.desc: It's a land of pyramids, gold, and ancient treasure, but it's not Egypt. It's present-day Sudan, once home to the glorious kingdom of Kush. Now, archaeologists are using every means possible – from robots to rock climbers – in their search for clues about this long-neglected culture. Once the Kushites filled the pharaohs' coffers with gold and, for a time, they even ruled over all of Egypt, but only now is their real story beginning to emerge.

programme.title: Black Pharaohs: Sunken Treasures
programme.desc: In a land of gold and ancient treasure, a recent discovery inside a pyramid sends archaeologists in search of clues about the glorious Nubian kingdom. But this isnt an average excavation this pyramid is flooded with water. For the first time ever, archaeologists dive inside underwater pyramid tombs to shed new light on the ancient Nubian kingdom who overthrew the pharaohs and ruled over all of Egypt for 75 years.

programme.title: Killing Reagan
programme.desc: Based on the Bill O'Reilly book of the same name. Just two months into his presidency, Ronald Reagan lay near death after a gunman's bullet came within inches of his heart. His recovery was nothing short of remarkable -- or so it seemed. But Reagan was grievously injured, forcing him to encounter a challenge that few men ever face. Could he silently overcome his traumatic experience while at the same time carrying out the duties of the most powerful man in the world?

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Everyone in school loves the band and they're waiting for the new song. It was announced on the blog that their new song is coming up, even though they haven't even started working on it. Kale is one of the biggest fans, and the band is shocked when they find out she is their new classmate. They have to keep their identities secret, but Kale discovers a School of Rock patch on the hallway and now she knows that the members of the band are from the school. She is determined to uncover who they are.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: It's time for the band to make their first music video. Both Tomika and Freddie have ideas, but totally different ones. This causes tension in the band, as the two of them keep arguing. They can't make the video with the two of them fighting, so Mr Finn tells them they will shoot it without them. He hopes this would make them rejoin the band and give up their discussion. But it doesn't work, so they need a new solution if they want the whole band in the video.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: 44 Cats

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: Gil, Molly, Bubble Puppy, Goby, Deema, Oona, Nonny and Zooli are a group of excitable mermaid and merman preschoolers. They teach important life lessons, as well as those of an academic kind through songs involving maths, science and literacy. Have fun and learn something new with the Bubble Guppies! Each has their own unique personality, which you will discover throughout the show... Gil is so quick and energetic, Molly is a natural born leader, and Deema is such a drama queen!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Fairy Axle City is inhabited by various cars: fast and slow, huge and tiny, careful and reckless. There is one thing they all have in common- their strong desire to compete. Brave Blaze is the superfast monster truck, the famous hero of Axle City. He has his friend who use special robot power to save the day. AJ is his 8-year-old driver, best friend and technology guru. Together they get to know how things work and master physics and mathematics, win all the races in the city. Their main rival is sly monster truck Crusher, he likes to cheat a lot and is ready for everything to become the winner on the track.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas
programme.desc: Capitán Santiago, his pet frog Kiko, cousin Tomás and mermaid friend Lorelai are the Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto! And with his magic pirate ship El Bravo and enchanted tools, Santiago will lead his brave crew on heroic quests across the high seas to keep his family and friends safe. But it's not all smooth sailing, as they must outsmart and out-pirate nefarious villains and unexpected enemies along the way.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day! Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Follow Ryder and his team of trusty side-pups as they try their best to help keep Adventure Bay safe from mayhem and mischief. Alongside his service pups Marshall, Rubble, Chase, Zuma, Rocky and Skye, ten-year-old Ryder proudly leads the Paw Patrol team as they confront their rivals over in the neighbouring town of Foggy Bottom. Under the watch of an arrogant Mayor Humdinger, Foggy Bottom's local crew of pesky kitties love nothing more than eating candy and stirring up a little trouble for Ryder and his friends. Lucky for the citizens of Adventure Bay, "no job is too big and no pup is too small" for the team to handle, and whether navigating sea, land or sky, these mighty pups are ready to go, go, go!

programme.title: 44 Cats

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: When pets are banned from the building, Annie and Pony have to convince the landlord to reconsider. When the dog from next door, Pony's sworn enemy, comes to stay with them, Annie needs to find a way to make them get along.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: A normal girl's life is made extraordinary by her best friend – an unpredictable, outrageous, and hilarious talking pony. No matter the complications he causes, Annie knows that everything is better when Pony is around.

programme.title: City Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to LEGO City. A modern metropolis filled with the fiercest firefighters, the cream of the crop cops, and so many BLOCKHEADS. Every citizen will assemble together for the most awesomely awesome adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln has a plan for introducing himself to a new girl, but when the sisters catch him he has to avoid them. Pop Pop introduces his new girlfriend to the family. She seems great until she starts showing up unannounced.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Meet The Thundermans, a typical suburban family that happens to have astounding superpowers. At the center of the action are the 14-year-old Thunderman twins, who share the same bathroom, the same school, and the same annoying little siblings. Their only difference? The sister is a super student with a super sunny disposition who super looks forward to being a superhero someday, and her twin brother is a super villain.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Izšķirtspēja
programme.desc: 28.epizode. Ilona Balode-Ūdre. Mūziķa Rolanda Ūdra dzīve mainījās pēc traģiskās avārijas pirms četriem gadiem. Arī viņa sievai Ilonai, kuras jaunā grāmata "Ielu muzikanta piezīmes" atklāj notikumus abu kopīgajā ikdienā no pārgalvīgiem ceļojumiem agrāk un realitātei tagad. Kā likt atbildīgajām instancēm ķerties pie elementāri atrisināmu jautājumu sakārtošanas, kā iekļauties pasaulē, kurā citādību ne visi uztver kā normu, klausies sarunā ar rakstnieci, aktrisi, sievu un mammu Ilonu Balodi-Ūdri.

programme.title: Mēs?
programme.desc: Grandioza 20. gs. Beigu vēsturisko pārmaiņu laikā veidota dokumentāla filma piecās daļās. Tā parāda Padomju Savienību pirms tās sairšanas laikā no 1987.- 1989. gadam. Filmā redzam pirmās neatkarības demonstrācijas Latvijā, nemierus Uzbekistānā, zemestrīcē izdzīvojušos Armēnijā, streikojošos strādniekus Jeroslavļā, bijušo iedzīvotāju atgriešanos Černobiļā, Gorbačova konfliktu ar Jeļcinu. Šī filma dod unikālu iespēju vērot un vērtēt notikumus nevis no ārzemju tūrista vai žurnālista acīm, bet no "iekšpuses".

programme.title: Разрушители легенд
programme.desc: Каждый из выпусков "Разрушители легенд" посвящён двум и более городским легендам, распространённым убеждениям или слухам из интернета. Основной миф часто требует всесторонней подготовки и специального полигона для испытания; кроме него в передачу также включают один-два не столь хлопотных в плане подготовки и проведения мифа. Некоторые эксперименты оказываются настолько сложными, что им посвящается весь час, отведённый на передачу. Иногда для проверки целого комплекса связанных мифов выпуск длится вдвое дольше обычного. Ведущие Джейми Хайнеман и Адам Сэвидж больше 30 лет работали в сфере кинопроизводства (в области спецэффектов) Они были главными техниками в Звёздных войнах (например, программировали движения дроидов). Впоследствии они стали использовать свои обширные инженерные знания и богатый опыт конструирования для создания сложных механических устройств, используемых в проведении экспериментов. Они разрабатывают, собирают и используют эти механизмы в мастерской спецэффектов M5 Industries Хайнемана. Часто испытания проходят и в других местах Сан-Франциско и его окрестностей, в том числе на бывшей военно-морской авиабазе в Аламиде, бывшей авиабазе ВВС "Хэмилтон" в Новато, на гражданском авиакосмическом полигоне "Мохаве Спейспорт", или в пустыне Мохаве, где проверяются мифы, связанные с ракетами.

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. Свет от далеких звезд идет до Земли миллионы лет и приходит неизменным. Человек видит окружающие предметы исключительно благодаря фотонам. Проведенные исследования породили еще одну версию возникновение мира, согласно которой мир создан из света и может быть вновь обращен в свет. Об этом и многом другом расскажет Документальный проект.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Разрушители легенд
programme.desc: Каждый из выпусков "Разрушители легенд" посвящён двум и более городским легендам, распространённым убеждениям или слухам из интернета. Основной миф часто требует всесторонней подготовки и специального полигона для испытания; кроме него в передачу также включают один-два не столь хлопотных в плане подготовки и проведения мифа. Некоторые эксперименты оказываются настолько сложными, что им посвящается весь час, отведённый на передачу. Иногда для проверки целого комплекса связанных мифов выпуск длится вдвое дольше обычного. Ведущие Джейми Хайнеман и Адам Сэвидж больше 30 лет работали в сфере кинопроизводства (в области спецэффектов) Они были главными техниками в Звёздных войнах (например, программировали движения дроидов). Впоследствии они стали использовать свои обширные инженерные знания и богатый опыт конструирования для создания сложных механических устройств, используемых в проведении экспериментов. Они разрабатывают, собирают и используют эти механизмы в мастерской спецэффектов M5 Industries Хайнемана. Часто испытания проходят и в других местах Сан-Франциско и его окрестностей, в том числе на бывшей военно-морской авиабазе в Аламиде, бывшей авиабазе ВВС "Хэмилтон" в Новато, на гражданском авиакосмическом полигоне "Мохаве Спейспорт", или в пустыне Мохаве, где проверяются мифы, связанные с ракетами.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. programme.title: Участковый
programme.desc: "Новоселки" – сленговое название микрорайона на окраине столицы, в котором процветает преступность. Местные жители так привыкли к такому положению вещей, что кажется, уже никто и никогда не сможет заставить их поверить в силы правосудия. Но жизнь микрорайона меняется с приездом нового участкового Сергея Громова, бывшего старшего следователя убойного отдела... Сергей не любит вспоминать о своем прошлом, но работа оперативника научила его мгновенно оценивать ситуацию и принимать решения. Он не будет разгадывать ребусы свершившихся злодеяний, его задача – работа на опережение преступников…

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" – это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" – это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. programme.title: Учитель в законе. Возвращение
programme.desc: С тех пор как Борис Богомолов, он же Богомол, в прошлом – вор в законе, а ныне – добропорядочный учитель, нашел своего сына Ваню, прошел целый год. Они вместе живут в городе Солнечный, Ваня ходит в школу, а Борис Андреевич руководит приютом для детей. С законом у Богомола все в порядке, с прошлым он завязал.… Но неожиданно учителя вновь затягивает водоворот криминальных событий: во время рейдерского захвата ювелирного завода директора производства расстреливают прямо у проходной. Происходит это сразу после его встречи с Богомолом, который тут же становится главным подозреваемым. Настоящий заказчик и захвата, и убийства — авторитет Вагон. Вскоре становится очевидно, что эти преступления — лишь мелкая деталь в криминальной схеме по продаже за границу ворованных якутских алмазов. Удастся ли учителю обелить себя, вывести на чистую воду преступников и спасти сына, на которого объявил охоту коварный враг?

programme.title: Барсы
programme.desc: Трое верных друзей Егор, Мишка и Александр когда-то составляли гордость отряда спецназа "Барсы". Прошло много лет с момента их последнего задания, каждый давно живет своей жизнью и новой работой, но дружбу они сберегли, хотя встречаться стали редко. Егор работает егерем в заповеднике. Однажды он находит в лесу убитого журналиста. Все подозрения падают на сотрудников местного ЧОПа, которых накануне видели в этих краях. Однако местная полиция не спешит проводить расследование и не интересуется подозреваемыми. Тогда Егор планирует взять дело в свои руки. Он находит доказательства того, что в смерти журналиста виновен некто Василевский, столичный бизнесмен, который метит на пост мэра города. Погибший журналист обвинял того в серии заказных убийств, совершенных сотрудниками охранного предприятия. Егор намеревается передать компромат на предпринимателя честному и принципиальному полковнику Макарову. Об этих намерениях узнает сам Василевский и распоряжается взять в заложники армейского друга Егора с дочерью. Затем он предлагает обменять молчание егеря на жизнь заложников. Однако Василевский до поры до времени не догадывается, какими неприятностями для него обернется эта грязная игра...

programme.desc: Raidījums, kurā katru darba dienu tiek aicināta kāda aktuāla personība attiecīgajam laikam, pilsētas aktualitātēm un notikumiem.

programme.title: Globuss
programme.desc: Raidījums "Globuss" reizi nedēļā skaidro ārpolitikas un starptautiskās aktualitātes, no kurām izriet arī Latvijas politiskā, ekonomiskā, tautsaimniecības un kultūras pozīcija un pārmaiņas.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Detention Adventure
programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. However, they have good reason to do this as they are trying to find the entrance to a secret maze of tunnels filled with hidden traps that protect the legendary laboratory of Alexander Graham Bell. Raign (Simone Miller), Joy (Alina Prijono), and Hulk (Jack Fulton) are the three whip-smart geeks who discover an old textbook which points them to Bell's lab, conveniently hidden beneath their school. The school bully, Brett (Tomaso Sanelli) a detention regular, soons joins them as they use all of their attributes to try to navigate through the labyrinth and find hidden passageways to lead them to their goal.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Secrets of the Human Body
programme.desc: The human body is the most sophisticated organism on earth. It's a scientific marvel and much about it remains a mystery. Secrets of the Human Body uses cutting-edge graphics to effectively peel back the skin and reveal the surprisingly beautiful biological processes that keep us alive. A chilling dip in an icy lake demonstrates how shivering might save our lives and low-level torture in a London laboratory highlights the way our bodies block pain. Discover the fascinating and finely tuned systems that keep the body motoring – and the scientists guessing.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Arctic foxes, sea otters, tamarin monkeys and red pandas are just some of the tiniest, cutest creatures featured in Baby Animals. With their big eyes and wobbly first steps, nature's newbies are irresistible. Watch how animals nurture their young as infant elephants, baby bison and rambunctious rhinos all eat, sleep and play their way to adulthood. Cuddly, clumsy and full of mischief, the babies of the animal kingdom certainly make up the wildest daycare you've ever seen.

programme.title: Wild But True With Robert Irwin
programme.desc: Wild But True is a fun and exciting biomimicry series that explores how nature and wildlife have influenced our modern day lives. Robert Irwin, our Wildlife Warrior and nature lover, teams up with Isabel Yamazaki, our resident scientist, to reveal how science has made mankind a true student of Mother Nature. In each episode, Robert and Isabel explore nature's amazing solutions for problems in the wild and reveal how humans use these blueprints to make the world greener, safer, more efficient and more fun for future generations.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Detention Adventure
programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. However, they have good reason to do this as they are trying to find the entrance to a secret maze of tunnels filled with hidden traps that protect the legendary laboratory of Alexander Graham Bell. The school bully, Brett (Tomaso Sanelli) a detention regular, soons joins them as they use all of their attributes to try to navigate through the labyrinth and find hidden passageways to lead them to their goal.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler is an American television personality, author, science teacher and the host of Xploration DIY SCI show. Each episode is about a certain science concept strengthened by science experiments, so that theory and practice are integrated. Steve conducts his fun experiments using everyday items everybody can get, so anyone can be a scientist. Watch, have fun and learn about the power of pressure, power of gas, laws of inertia, how to make elephant toothpaste at home and much more.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. programme.title: Deadly Pole to Pole
programme.desc: Deadly Pole to Pole is a documentary series hosted by Steve Backshall, who travels pole to pole through the Americas while looking for the most dangerous animals. Join Steve and his deadliest adventure- 14-month voyage from the Arctic to the Antarctic via Alaska, California, Hawaii, Mexico and Brazil and many more amazing locations. Have a look at his meetings with white whales, ice bears, sharks, eagles, wolves, sea lions, eagles, crocodiles, snakes and spiders.

programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

programme.title: Penktasis kėlinys. Endesa krepšinio lygos apžvalga
Grappling LT. Jaunimo čempionatas, Ukmergė, penkta laida
Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei
programme.desc: SPORT1 televizija kartu su Sporto rėmimo fondu pristatė projektą "Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei 2020", kurio metu siekiama į aktyvų laisvalaikį įtraukti net tuos vaikus, kurie vietoje fizinio aktyvumo renkasi žalingus įpročius ar net netinkamą veiklą.

programme.title: Čempionų kelias. "Vieningoji" krepšinio lyga. Maskvos CSKA – Permės "Parma"
Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Pirmos rungtynės: Barselonos "Barca" – Madrido "Real"
Rally Albania. CFMOTO Factory Racing Team pasirodymas varžybose
One Championship on TNT I. Mišrių kovos menų čempionatas
Copes garša
programme.desc: Cope ir hobijs, bauda, prieks, emociju gamma no veiksmes līdz neveiksmei un atkal otrādi. Tā ved ārpus mājas, dabā, tā sagādā piedzīvojumus vienatnē vai kopā ar draugiem, tā rosina sajūtas, atpūtina ķermeni un prātu un bagātina dzīves "garšu"! "Copes Garša" ir informatīvi izglītojošs raidījums internetā Youtube kanālā, Facebook profilā un makšķernieku foruma mājaslapā copeslietas.lv. Raidījuma "Copes Garša" mērķis ir ar makšķernieku sabiedrībā zināmu sportistu paraugu popularizēt makšķerēšanu kā mūsdienīga, aktīva un veselīga dzīvesveida sastāvdaļu un aizraujošu sporta aktivitāti, vienlaikus piesaistot attiecīgos speciālistus, informēt un izglītot Latvijas makšķerniekus, sevišķi jauno paaudzi, par atbildīgas, saimnieciskas, saudzīgas un ilgstpējīgas zivju resursu izmantošanas pamatprincipiem, dabas aizsardzību un līdzdalību tās resursu saglabāšanā un atjaunošanā.

programme.title: Убей меня трижды
programme.desc: Молодая женщина, живущая в австралийском городке, является нитью, которая связывает три истории – убийства, шантажа и мести.

programme.title: Джекил и Хайд
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в Лондоне 1930-х годов, где Роберт Джекил, внук Генри Джекила, воспитанный на Цейлоне приёмными родителями, пытается узнать правду о своей настоящей семье и понять причину своих странных "приступов". По пятам за Робертом следует "Ми-И", британская спецслужба, занимающаяся паранормальными явлениями, а также агенты некоего сообщества, называемого "Тенебри".

programme.title: Бессонная ночь
programme.desc: Винсент — коп, который в ходе операции крадет у бандитов мешок кокаина. Гангстеры решают похитить сына Винсента, чтобы вернуть кокаин. Но к этому моменту герой уже не имеет при себе наркотики. Чтобы спасти своего сына, он должен отложить столько, сколько может, время обмена. Предстоящая ночь, кажется, самая длинная в его жизни и, возможно, даже последняя…

programme.title: Хиросима
programme.desc: История атомной бомбардировки Хиросимы и ее последствий, показанная через мирных жителей — взрослых и детей.

programme.title: Король говорит!
programme.desc: Сюжет ленты расскажет о герцоге, который готовится вступить в должность британского короля Георга VI, отца нынешней королевы Елизаветы II. После того, как его брат отрекается от престола, герой неохотно соглашается на трон. Измученный страшным нервным заиканием и сомнениями в своих способностях руководить страной, Георг обращается за помощью к неортодоксальному логопеду по имени Лайонел Лог.

programme.title: Убей меня трижды
programme.desc: Молодая женщина, живущая в австралийском городке, является нитью, которая связывает три истории – убийства, шантажа и мести.

programme.title: Хамелеон
programme.desc: Скромный бухгалтер фабрики резиновых изделий Франсуа Пиньон однажды из разговора коллег узнаёт о том, что его хотят уволить. Франсуа решает покончить с собой, прыгнув с балкона, но его останавливает сосед, а узнав о причине такого поступка, берётся решить проблему Пиньона при помощи небольшой фальсификации и скандальных слухов.

programme.title: Короли интриги
programme.desc: Забытая всеми кинозвезда золотой эпохи Мара Ортис ведет затворнический образ жизни в старинном особняке в пригороде Буэнос-Айреса. Дом актриса делит с экстравагантной компанией бывших свидетелей ее увядшей славы: влюбленным в нее супругом-актером эпизода, язвительным сценаристом и режиссером-циником. Отношения этой четверки далеки от совершенства, они балансируют между обожанием и неприязнью. Однажды на пороге появляются гости – молодая пара, положившая глаз на звездное поместье. Они притворяются поклонниками Мары и убеждают актрису продать дом. Однако на пути акул бизнеса встают мастера дьявольских интриг. Смертельный поединок начинается.

programme.title: Постановка
programme.desc: Из-за пандемии коронавируса актеры Вест-Эндского театра временно остались без работы в изоляции. Но чтобы не терять форму и не сходить с ума из-за происходящего в мире, они решают продолжать репетиции удаленно, что иногда становится причиной комических и абсурдных ситуаций.

programme.title: Замечательная жизнь
programme.desc: Влюбленная пара Ян и Надя решают купить старое, полуразрушенное здание на берегу озера, чтобы открыть в нем ресторан. Дело это не простое, финансирование для проекта получить очень трудно, и герои фильма набирают кредиты. Однако, их доходы не столь высоки, чтобы оплачивать проценты, и тогда Надя принимает решение поехать в Монреаль, поискать другую работу. Уезжая, женщина поручает Яну присматривать за своим сыном. А вскоре после отъезда связь с Надей прерывается, она исчезает, не давая о себе никаких новостей…

programme.title: Холостяк
programme.desc: Комедия, Италия, Испания. 1956 / Паоло Анзельми, убеждённый холостяк, считает, что брак стеснит его свободу. После того как его друг Армандо женился, Паоло переезжает из их общей квартиры в небольшой пансионат и знакомится с молодой хозяйкой Габриэлой. Между ними завязываются серьёзные отношения, продолжающиеся до тех пор, пока она не заговаривает о женитьбе. Вырвавшись на свободу, Паоло бросается c головой в новые любовные приключения, но в конце концов разочаровывается во всём и чувствует себя одиноким. Кроме того и мать Паоло настаивает на его женитьбе. Но у всех возможных кандидаток есть какие-то недостатки: ревность, многочисленная родня, слишком болтливы. Но вот на его пути встречается Карла...

programme.title: Хамелеон
programme.desc: Скромный бухгалтер фабрики резиновых изделий Франсуа Пиньон однажды из разговора коллег узнаёт о том, что его хотят уволить. Франсуа решает покончить с собой, прыгнув с балкона, но его останавливает сосед, а узнав о причине такого поступка, берётся решить проблему Пиньона при помощи небольшой фальсификации и скандальных слухов.

programme.title: Короли интриги
programme.desc: Забытая всеми кинозвезда золотой эпохи Мара Ортис ведет затворнический образ жизни в старинном особняке в пригороде Буэнос-Айреса.
